name: UPatternTool_BoundingBoxSettings
doc: Settings for Bounding Box adjustments in the Pattern Tool

bIgnoreTransforms: If true, pattern element bounding boxes are not changed to account for StartScale or StartRotation
Adjustment: Value added to the all pattern elements' bounding boxes for adjusting the behavior of packed spacing mode manually
bVisualize: If true, the bounding boxes of each element are rendered in green and the combined bounding box of all source elements is rendered in red
